featured.text: Michael Phelps, an American swimmer, broke seven world records and won eight gold medals in men’s swimming _____ in the 2008 Olympics.

definition.zh_def: 菲爾普斯（Michael Phelps）是一位美國游泳運動員，被認為是歷史上最偉大的游泳選手之一。
definition.en_def: Phelps refers to Michael Phelps, an American swimmer considered one of the greatest athletes in Olympic history.
definition.example: Michael Phelps won a total of 23 Olympic gold medals during his swimming career.
